title: Epic: User Authentication & Account Management
body: Parent epic for all authentication-related user flows including registration, login, wallet linking, and password recovery.

title: Epic: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
body: Parent epic for all role-based access permission and enforcement across the API.

title: Epic: Crypto Payments (Lightning & Ethereum)
body: Enable crypto-native payments via the Bitcoin Lightning Network and Ethereum (ETH, USDC).

title: Epic: NFT Membership System
body: Use ERC-721 NFTs to represent tiered memberships with perks, expiration, and access rights.

title: Epic: Subscription & Streaming Payments
body: Add support for recurring billing via smart contracts or off-chain systems.

title: Epic: POS Interface & Checkouts
body: POS system to allow operators to take crypto payments in physical venues.

title: Epic: Loyalty & Rewards
body: System to reward users with NFTs and perks for engagement and spending.

title: Epic: Event Check-in System
body: Track physical presence and participation using wallet or NFT credentials.

title: Epic: DevOps & Infrastructure
body: Ensure platform services are deployable and maintainable using Docker and CI/CD.

title: Epic: Testing & QA
body: Develop automated tests and ensure quality with test coverage.

title: Epic: MVP Launch & Pilot
body: Run pilot deployments at real venues and monitor system usage.

title: User Registration
body:
**As a** new user
**I want to** register with my email and password
**So that** I can create an account on ZephyrPay

title: User Login
body:
**As a** registered user
**I want to** log in with my credentials
**So that** I can access the platform

title: Password Recovery
body:
**As a** user
**I want to** recover my account if I forget my password
**So that** I can regain access securely

title: Link ETH & LN Wallets
body:
**As a** user
**I want to** link my Ethereum and Lightning wallets
**So that** I can use crypto features

title: Assign Roles to Users
body:
**As an** admin
**I want to** assign roles to users (Admin, Operator, Member)
**So that** they have the correct access

title: RBAC Middleware Enforcement
body:
**As a** system
**I want to** block unauthorized access
**So that** users only access permitted endpoints

title: Generate Lightning Invoice
body:
**As a** member
**I want to** generate a Lightning invoice
**So that** I can pay for access or services

title: Confirm Lightning Payment
body:
**As a** system
**I want to** check payment status
**So that** I can unlock services

title: Verify Ethereum Payment
body:
**As a** member
**I want to** send ETH or USDC
**So that** I can unlock access

title: Mint NFT Membership
body:
**As a** user
**I want to** mint a membership NFT
**So that** I can access Zo Houses

title: Verify NFT Ownership
body:
**As a** system
**I want to** verify NFT ownership
**So that** I can grant or deny access

title: Create Subscription
body:
**As a** user
**I want to** subscribe monthly or annually
**So that** I don’t have to pay each time

title: Cancel or Pause Subscription
body:
**As a** user
**I want to** cancel or pause my subscription
**So that** I can stop charges

title: Checkout With Lightning
body:
**As a** space operator
**I want to** generate a Lightning invoice
**So that** I can receive IRL payment

title: Checkout With Ethereum
body:
**As a** space operator
**I want to** collect ETH/USDC via QR
**So that** I can accept crypto at the register

title: View Checkout History
body:
**As a** merchant
**I want to** see a list of past payments
**So that** I can track performance

title: Issue Loyalty NFTs
body:
**As a** system
**I want to** mint NFTs for event attendance
**So that** users feel rewarded

title: Redeem Perks
body:
**As a** member
**I want to** trade loyalty points for rewards
**So that** I benefit from consistent usage

title: Check In With NFT or Payment
body:
**As a** user
**I want to** check in via QR or NFT scan
**So that** my attendance is logged

title: CI/CD Pipeline
body:
**As a** developer
**I want to** auto-deploy code from GitHub
**So that** we streamline testing

title: Supabase + LNBits + IPFS Setup
body:
**As a** team
**We need to** configure backend services
**So that** app works across all layers

title: Unit Tests
body:
**As a** developer
**I want to** ensure all modules are tested
**So that** the code is reliable

title: E2E Tests
body:
**As a** QA tester
**I want to** simulate real user flows
**So that** we can catch bugs before launch

title: Admin Dashboard
body:
**As an** admin
**I want to** monitor user activity and payments
**So that** I can manage operations

title: Deploy to Partner Venue
body:
**As a** pilot team
**We want to** test the platform in a real venue
**So that** we validate UX and performance
